### Super Informative Scatterplot

```{r}
plot_tree <- ggplot(trees, aes(Girth, Height)) +
  geom_point(aes(colour = Volume), size = 4) +
  #scale_color_gradient(low="blue", high="red") +
  scale_color_gradientn(colours = rainbow(5)) +
  theme_bw()
  
ggplotly(plot_tree)

```

Row {data-height=400}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Correlation Matrix

```{r}
trees_cor <- trees %>% 
  correlate() 

trees_cor %>% 
  rearrange() %>% 
  fashion() %>% 
  knitr::kable()

```
